group_1.textLeft: Besides, I still live a normal life, ya knooow...@I eat food, I go to school.
I do the bare minimum...@Just what I need to stay alive.

group_1.textRight: It really is just the bare minimum though, isn't it...?

group_1.textLeft: Even though it's a drag, I still do what I need to live.
...Why do you think that is?

group_1.textRight: ...Normal is "the same as usual"...@There's nothing special about it...

group_1.textLeft: That's riiight～...
People who value life take care of themselves@like normal.

group_1.textRight: Stop it, don't talk like that...

group_1.textLeft: ...But it's reality, so listen to me.
I talk to you...because I think of you as an equal@friend.
So for me...it's just as you feared...
I have no attachments.
This or that, there's nothing I really care about...
There isn't anything I want...
Being a slacker, sleeping is what I love most.
It's like I don't have any attachment to living.
But y'know, I'm still alive today,@and I'm still trying to live.
Because you're important to me, Akari.
Yup.@Akari, Papa and Mama, my older sisters...
My friends who stick with me...
Everyone, they're all special to me.
That's why, even today,@I'm trying a little harder to live.
Because all those people special to me would be sad@if I'm gone.
Ehehe...
That's why, y'know...@You don't have to worry about me...
Never waking up again when I fall asleep,
getting abducted by aliens,@or disappearing from your life,
none of that is happening,@so you don't have to worry.

group_1.textRight: You're seriously such an idiot...@What the heck is this...you dummy...

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha... Are you back in a good mood...?

group_1.textRight: Hmph... I was only mad at you because you're@such an idiot...

group_1.textLeft: Then...will you come wake me up again?

group_1.textRight: Good grief... I guess it can't be helped.
Fine by me. I'll come make sure you wake up.

group_1.textLeft: Hooraaay～...@Starting tomorrow, I can sleep soundly again～...
